inclusion.criterion: two or more episodes of bacteriuria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: one episode of pyelonephritis during pregnancy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Women with malformations of the urinary tract
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of recurrent UTIs, but is currently not pregnant and does not have malformations of the urinary tract. However, they do have diabetes mellitus which may increase their risk for UTIs.
